nodes.text: Hope Station was a location affiliated with the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Galactic Civil War. In 3 ABY, whilst the Alliance's 61st Mobile Infantry and other rebel groups escorted the Alliance Fleet out of the Mid Rim, Hope Station was lost. The 61st's captain, Micha Evon, later informed his top staff of the loss of Hope Station, along with Talrezan Four and Unroola Dawn, in a meeting with them.
Hope Station was mentioned in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
